predicate.note: Frames file for 'compromise' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'agree'

example.name: generally unhelpful example
example.text: ``They said universally, without a single exception: Don't even compromise.

example.name: more illustrative
example.text: John compromised with Mary on the menu for their dinner together.
example.arg: the menu for their dinner together

example.name: made-up
example.text: The hygiene of John's home was compromised *trace* by his habit of leaving his dirty socks lying around.
example.arg: his habit of leaving his dirty socks lying around.
